data.name: RetrieveColumns
data.value: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, NUMERIC_PRECISION, NUMERIC_SCALE, IS_NULLABLE FROM [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = @Schema AND TABLE_NAME = @Table ORDER BY 1

data.name: RetrieveRelations
data.value: SELECT CONCAT(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.parent_object_id), '.', OBJECT_NAME(fk.parent_object_id), ' via (', OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.parent_object_id), '.', fk.name, ')') AS RELATION_NAME, DB_NAME() AS CONSTRAINT_CATALOG, OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.object_id) + '.' + fk.name AS CONSTRAINT_NAME, DB_NAME() AS TABLE_CATALOG, OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.parent_object_id) + '.' + OBJECT_NAME(fk.parent_object_id) AS TABLE_NAME, fkcl.name AS COLUMN_NAME, fkc.constraint_column_id AS ORDINAL_POSITION, --NULL AS UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_CATALOG, --NULL AS UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME, DB_NAME() AS UNIQUE_TABLE_CATALOG, OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.referenced_object_id) + '.' + OBJECT_NAME(fk.referenced_object_id) AS UNIQUE_TABLE_NAME, fkcr.name AS UNIQUE_COLUMN_NAME FROM sys.foreign_keys fk INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns fkc ON (fk.object_id = fkc.constraint_object_id) INNER JOIN sys.columns fkcl ON (fkc.parent_object_id = fkcl.object_id AND fkc.parent_column_id = fkcl.column_id) INNER JOIN sys.columns fkcr ON (fkc.referenced_object_id = fkcr.object_id AND fkc.referenced_column_id = fkcr.column_id) WHERE fk.referenced_object_id = OBJECT_ID(@Schema_Table, 'TABLE')

data.name: RetrieveReverseRelations
data.value: SELECT CONCAT(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.referenced_object_id), '.', OBJECT_NAME(fk.referenced_object_id), ' via (', OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.parent_object_id), '.', fk.name, ')') AS RELATION_NAME, DB_NAME() AS CONSTRAINT_CATALOG, OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.object_id) + '.' + fk.name AS CONSTRAINT_NAME, DB_NAME() AS TABLE_CATALOG, OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.parent_object_id) + '.' + OBJECT_NAME(fk.parent_object_id) AS TABLE_NAME, fkcl.name AS COLUMN_NAME, fkc.constraint_column_id AS ORDINAL_POSITION, --NULL AS UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_CATALOG, --NULL AS UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME, DB_NAME() AS UNIQUE_TABLE_CATALOG, OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(fk.referenced_object_id) + '.' + OBJECT_NAME(fk.referenced_object_id) AS UNIQUE_TABLE_NAME, fkcr.name AS UNIQUE_COLUMN_NAME FROM sys.foreign_keys fk INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns fkc ON (fk.object_id = fkc.constraint_object_id) INNER JOIN sys.columns fkcl ON (fkc.parent_object_id = fkcl.object_id AND fkc.parent_column_id = fkcl.column_id) INNER JOIN sys.columns fkcr ON (fkc.referenced_object_id = fkcr.object_id AND fkc.referenced_column_id = fkcr.column_id) WHERE fk.parent_object_id = OBJECT_ID(@Schema_Table, 'TABLE')

data.name: RetrieveSchemas
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT NAME FROM [MASTER].[SYS].[DATABASES] WHERE HAS_DBACCESS(NAME)=1 ORDER BY 1

data.name: RetrieveTables
data.value: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE FROM [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[TABLES] ORDER BY 1
